title: waiting someone
content:
I am lucy. A cute white girl who want to date with a single man. I am eager for a good  
man lead a relationship to marriage.All can view my recent photos at mixedfriends.com by searching “lucy”. Whether black or white.

 [‹ choice font for print on demand](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019093735/http:/typophile.com/node/50511 "Go to previous forum topic") [Max Kerning ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019093735/http:/typophile.com/node/50508 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lucy1314

comments.content: I’m thinking you want to go with Comic Sans. Or maybe Curlz.

\>Whether black or white.

I think it’s more PC to say “Extra Bold or Light”

Cheers, Si

I think they say pretty much the same thing on Mac, too.

[You had to know that was coming.]
It would be more Mac to say “black, white or silver”
poor Lucy Sans, hopes to be Lucy Extra Bold.
